Title: Authorizes former members of the United States public health service to receive a distinguishing mark on their license indicating that they are a veteran
Summary: Authorizes former members of the United States public health service to receive a distinguishing mark on their license indicating that they are a veteran.
LawCode: Amd ยง504, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing a former member of the United States public health service to receive a distinguishing mark on his or her license indicating that he or she is a veteran
